fields.default:
1. Parties

This Agreement is entered into between the Airport Authority (“Licensor”) and the Shop Operator (“Licensee”).

2. Licensed / Leased Premises

The Licensor grants the Licensee the right to operate a retail shop in the designated space within the airport terminal, as specified above.

3. Purpose of Use

The premises shall be used only for the approved retail/business activity as permitted by the Airport Authority and shall not be used for any other purpose without prior written consent.

4. Term / Duration

The term of this Agreement shall be for the duration as given above.

5. Commencement Date

The Agreement shall commence from the start date as given above.

6. Expiry / End Date

This Agreement shall automatically expire on the end date as given above, unless renewed or extended in writing by the Licensor.

7. License Fee / Rent

The Licensee shall pay the agreed license fee/rent to the Licensor as specified above, within the stipulated timelines.

8. Revenue Share (if applicable)

In addition to the fixed license fee, the Licensee shall pay a revenue share percentage as agreed and specified above, calculated on gross sales.

9. Security Deposit

The Licensee shall deposit a refundable security amount as mentioned above, which shall be adjusted against dues or refunded subject to satisfactory handover of the premises.

10. Utilities & Operational Costs

All electricity, water, internet, waste management, and other operational charges shall be borne by the Licensee unless otherwise specified above.

11. Maintenance & Housekeeping

The Licensee shall maintain the premises in a clean, safe, and hygienic condition at all times, in compliance with airport standards.

12. Compliance with Airport Rules

The Licensee shall comply with:

Airport security regulations

Safety and fire norms

Operational timings

Branding, signage, and display guidelines
as issued by the Airport Authority from time to time.

13. Alterations & Fit-Out

No structural or design modifications shall be made without prior written approval of the Licensor. All fit-outs shall conform to airport specifications.

14. Staffing & Security

All staff deployed by the Licensee must comply with airport security clearance, dress code, and access regulations.

15. Insurance

The Licensee shall maintain valid insurance coverage for:

Public liability

Fire and theft

Employees (if applicable)
as required by the Airport Authority.

16. Termination

The Licensor may terminate the Agreement:

For breach of terms

For security or operational reasons

As per notice period specified above

The Licensee may terminate the Agreement by giving written notice as specified above.

17. Force Majeure

Neither party shall be liable for failure to perform obligations due to events beyond reasonable control, including natural disasters, government orders, or airport shutdowns.

18. Handover on Expiry / Termination

Upon expiry or termination, the Licensee shall vacate and hand over the premises in good condition, subject to normal wear and tear.

19. Governing Law & Jurisdiction

This Agreement shall be governed by the laws as specified above, and disputes shall be subject to the jurisdiction as mentioned above.
fields.label: Terms of Contract
